video.title: Video Player
video.description: Professional video playback with multi-language audio and subtitle support
video.heroDescription: Multi-language video player optimized for low-resource environments with advanced subtitle support and AI-powered generation.

formats.title: Multi-Format Support
formats.description: Supports MP4, MKV, WebM with HLS and MPEG-DASH streaming protocols for maximum compatibility.

audio.title: Multi-Language Audio
audio.description: Seamless switching between multiple audio tracks in different languages with automatic detection.

subtitles.title: Advanced Subtitles
subtitles.description: Built-in subtitle support with external file upload, timing controls, and AI-powered generation.

generator.title: AI Subtitle Generation
generator.description: Upload videos and automatically generate subtitles in multiple languages using OpenAI Whisper
